curam.core.impl

Interface StreamableMapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Mapper
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SearchServiceMapperForStreaming

    public interface StreamableMapper
extends Mapper
    An extension to the mapper class to facilitate streaming and check pointing.

    The input data set is traversed fully to obtain all of its primary keys which are grouped into chunks which are written to the chunk table.

    These chunks are then processed by one or more streams to do the full processing of the data.

    • Method Detail

      • getRowKey

        byte[] getRowKey(SearchServiceKey serviceId,
                 java.lang.Object o)
          throws AppException,
                 InformationalException
        Get a serialized version of the primary or candidate key for the current record. This will be stored as a series of bytes in a blob.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the search service identifier.
        o - An object read from the database, typically a key struct.
        Returns:
        The key for that row, serialized into a byte array.
        Throws:
        AppException - Standard operation signature.
        InformationalException - Standard operation signature.

      • readRow

        java.lang.Object readRow(SearchServiceKey serviceId,
                         byte[] key)
                  throws AppException,
                         InformationalException
        Gets a struct from the database given a bytes representation of its key.
        Parameters:
        serviceId - the search service identifier.
        key - A byte array representation of a unique id for a row.
        Returns:
        A struct from the table in question.
        Throws:
        AppException - Standard operation signature.
        InformationalException - Standard operation signature.
